FactorGasAggregator.mainSelect: select C.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr, --0 C.CPOD, --1 a.operando, --2 --to_char(c.cdsti,'yyyymmdd'), --3 '20090701', data_validita_al, --4 case when a.operando='GFCORR1590' then GET_GFCORR1590(A.OPERANDO,C.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr) ELSE to_number(valori) END CASE, --5 nvl(prezzo,0) , --6 b.id_operando --7 from GAS_prodotto_operando a, GAS_anagrafica_operandi b, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrgas C,DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d where c.ctar1=a.ctar1 and C.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr IN (SELECT CNCON FROM Z_pr_in_lavorazione_gas) and a.operando = b.operando and tipo = 'FACTOR' and c.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr=d.dbi_punto_key --AND c.cdsti IS NOT NULL group by C.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr, C.CPOD, a.operando, to_char(c.cdsti,'yyyymmdd'), data_validita_al, to_number(valori), nvl(prezzo,0), b.id_operando order by a.operando

FactorGasExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT GAS_FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 GAS_FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 GAS_FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 GAS_FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 GAS_facts_f_factor.legacy, --4 GAS_facts_f_factor.tipo, --5 GAS_facts_f_factor.operand, --6 GAS_facts_f_factor.saison, --7 GAS_facts_f_factor.prog, --8 GAS_facts_v_factor.legacy, --9 GAS_facts_v_factor.tipo, --10 GAS_facts_v_factor.ab, --11 GAS_facts_v_factor.bis, --12 GAS_facts_v_factor.factor, --13 GAS_facts_v_factor.tarifart, --14 GAS_facts_v_factor.kondigr, --15 GAS_facts_v_factor.prog --16 from GAS_facts_key,GAS_facts_f_factor,GAS_facts_v_factor where GAS_facts_key.legacy = GAS_facts_f_factor.legacy and GAS_facts_v_factor.legacy=GAS_facts_key.legacy and GAS_facts_f_factor.legacy=GAS_facts_v_factor.legacy and GAS_facts_f_factor.prog=GAS_facts_v_factor.prog order by GAS_facts_f_factor.prog

UDEFGasAggregator.mainSelect: select v.cncon, --0 v.cncon, --1 a.operando, --2 -- to_char(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd'), -- 3 '20090701', '99991231' , --4 b.id_operando , --5 case when a.operando='TIPOLOGIAC' then 'A' when a.operando='GI_CATEGOR' then d.CATEGORIA_USO_GAS_ANU else a.CTAR1 end case from DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrgas v, z_prodotto_operando a, z_anagrafica_operandi b,dbi_user.ifc_delibera_gas d where a.ctar1=v.ctar1 and v.cncon IN (SELECT CNCON FROM Z_pr_in_lavorazione_gas) and a.operando = b.operando and d.pr_anu=v.cncon and tipo = 'USERDEF' group by v.cncon, v.cncon, to_char(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd'), a.operando,a.valori, d.CATEGORIA_USO_GAS_ANU, a.CTAR1, b.id_operando order by v.cncon

UDEFGasExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT GAS_FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 GAS_FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 GAS_FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 GAS_FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY, --4 GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.TIPO, --5 GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.OPERAND, --6 GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.SAISON,--7 GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.PROG, --8 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.LEGACY, --9 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.TIPO,--10 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.AB, --11 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.BIS, --12 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL1, --13 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL2,--14 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL3,--15 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL4,--16 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.TARIFART, --17 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.KONDGIR, --18 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.PROG --19 FROM GAS_FACTS_KEY,GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF,GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF WHERE GAS_FACTS_KEY.LEGACY = GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY AND GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY = GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.LEGACY and GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.PROG = GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.PROG order by GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.prog
